name: Slide'n Blast
description:
In this top down shooter all sprites are no more than 4x4 pixels. You need to slide your way through the different rooms with the four seasons themes and blast every enemy.

The fastest enemies are weaker but can reach you very fast.

Every resource in the game is made by me except for the font, I used the free font Aldo The Apache (https://www.dafont.com/fr/aj-paglia.d2141?l[]=10&l[]=1).

Music and sound effect are still work and progress though.
